title: macbook pro a1286 .....820-3330-b..no display
message: hi..i have a macbiik pro a1286 ..part no is 820-3330-b...before it was working everything is ok...but accidently i remove the lcd cable(on working condition)......after that there is no display on screen...but iam sure external display is ok...already i check another same display...still same...plz give me a solution

title: macbook pro a1286 .....820-3330-b..no display
message: Check diode mode to ground at both pins of D9701; w/ and w/o LCD connected.

title: macbook pro a1286 .....820-3330-b..no display
message:
Don't write ohm, for diode mode readings.
0.500 ohm is same as 0.5 ohm which is pure short in fact.

Post LCD_BKLT_EN/PWM levels.

title: macbook pro a1286 .....820-3330-b..no display
message:
Backlight is not even enable, don't waste time in that area.

Can you detect image, using a flashlight from behind?
Actually get external video for sure?
Can you confirm USB activity?

title: macbook pro a1286 .....820-3330-b..no display
message: this one ready sir.....this is lvds connector problm.....inside burn...( i think when i remove the lvds cable without unplug the power..thats why damage the connector...thank u for your support...
